entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as the one who consulted a parchment list and gave instructions to Harry.

entities.name: roberts
entities.description: Mr. Roberts is introduced as the site manager of the tents in the field.

entities.name: diggory
entities.description: The Diggorys are mentioned as people who live near the first field and second field.

entities.name: payne
entities.description: Mr. Payne is introduced as someone to ask for in the second field.

entities.name: horizon wood
entities.description: The dark wood on the horizon is mentioned as a location.

relationships.description: Mr. Weasley tells Harry to ask for Mr. Roberts in the first field.
Mr. Weasley tells Harry to ask for Mr. Payne in the second field.
